text: Nizhny Allaguvat () is a rural locality (a village) and the administrative center of Allaguvatsky Selsoviet, Sterlibashevsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 295 as of 2010. There are 4 streets. == Geography == It is located 41 km from Sterlibashevo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Sterlibashevsky District
title: Nizhny Allaguvat
